title: Phoenix Feathered Cloak
body:
Phoenix Feathered Cloak

Evan looked at the monster army and took a deep breath.

He was about to take action when suddenly a voice sounded inside his and Sebastian's mind.

'Ummm...can I also join the bet?'

Evan and Sebastian turned their heads at the same time and looked at Nathan who had an awkward expression on his face.

'Oy old man, don't try to interfere in our bet. That fruit belongs to me' After seeing the details of the mana affinity fruit, Sebastian decided to use all of his trump cards to finish off Stone Buffalo as soon as possible. In his eyes, the mana affinity fruit already belongs to him so there is no way he would allow Nathan to interfere in their bet.

'What do you mean by that the fruit belongs to you, don't talk like you've already won the bet' Nathan said in a sneering tone.

Evan was speechless when he saw they were arguing because of the mana affinity fruit.
